typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		population as string,
		year_week as string,
		week_end_date as string,
		week_start_date as string,
		source as string,
		{Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count} as string,
		{Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(country=='Spain') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
